column5: I'm taking the wife and kids to Esnagi Lake and we'll be staying in Wawa the night before.As I've never been there before, I'm looking for a good motel that will live up to the wife's cleanliness standards(the bar is much lower for me of course). Any recommendations would be greatly appreciated. Thanks
Go to page 6 above and the same question was asked a couple weeks ago. There are about 10 good replies. Have Fun!!!!
